message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it's a fantastic deal and worth every penny. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to $140. This product is truly top-quality, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I'm willing to pay up to $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
